step.action: Donner à un pion A la mission "Reconnaître zone
step.expectation: Le pion A lève une alrte NBC niveau 4, met sa combinaison NBC, rejoint la zone, effectue des mesures et se poste.

entry.bug:
When given a CBRN mission such as decontamination, it seems that the units are not wearing their CBRN suits since the appropriate icon does not appear in the Info box.
It is also the case when they receive the specific order "NBC Suit On".
